EmailTemplate.subject: Enhance Your Workplace Performance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Salesforce+Lead+Nurture+2&utm_content=Lead+Nurture]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/services-centre-5.aspx?cmp=EBLEADFAC19EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Salesforce+Lead+Nurture+2&utm_content=Lead+Nurture]]> Building Customized Facilities Solutions
From basic desktop cleaning supplies, to full janitorial programs, to breakroom services, find out how a customized solution can enhance the overall performance of your workplace.
